title: Understanding Outpatient Settings
text: Outpatient settings are designed to provide flexibility and support for clients. Consider how these settings might benefit both the client and the counselor.

title: Benefits of Outpatient Settings
text: Think about the advantages of outpatient settings in terms of cost, convenience, and the ability to maintain daily routines.

hintAnswer: more convenient, less expensive, encourage $$longer-term$$ $$\frac{client}{counselor}$$ relationships, keep the client working, and are more amenable to family support
title: Identifying Key Features
text: What are some key features of outpatient settings that make them appealing?
choices: one in which the client receives the most effective treatment that places the fewest restrictions on their life
